pdfMultiTool.name: PDF Multi Tool
pdfMultiTool.subtitle: Merge, Split, Organize, Delete, Rotate, Add Blank Pages, Extract and Duplicate in an unified interface.

mergePdf.name: Merge PDF
mergePdf.subtitle: Combine multiple PDFs into one file. Preserves Bookmarks.

splitPdf.name: Split PDF
splitPdf.subtitle: Extract a range of pages into a new PDF.

compressPdf.name: Compress PDF
compressPdf.subtitle: Reduce the file size of your PDF.
compressPdf.condenseInfo: Condense uses advanced compression: removes dead-weight, optimizes images, subsets fonts. Best for most PDFs.
compressPdf.photonInfo: Photon converts pages to images. Use for photo-heavy/scanned PDFs.
compressPdf.photonWarning: Warning: Text will become non-selectable and links will stop working.
compressPdf.grayscaleHint: Reduces file size by removing color information

pdfEditor.name: PDF Editor
pdfEditor.subtitle: Annotate, highlight, redact, comment, add shapes/images, search, and view PDFs.

jpgToPdf.name: JPG to PDF
jpgToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from JPG, JPEG, and JPEG2000 (JP2/JPX) images.

signPdf.name: Sign PDF
signPdf.subtitle: Draw, type, or upload your signature.

cropPdf.name: Crop PDF
cropPdf.subtitle: Trim the margins of every page in your PDF.

extractPages.name: Extract Pages
extractPages.subtitle: Save a selection of pages as new files.

deletePages.name: Delete Pages
deletePages.subtitle: Remove specific pages from your document.

editBookmarks.name: Edit Bookmarks
editBookmarks.subtitle: Add, edit, import, delete and extract PDF bookmarks.

tableOfContents.name: Table of Contents
tableOfContents.subtitle: Generate a table of contents page from PDF bookmarks.

pageNumbers.name: Page Numbers
pageNumbers.subtitle: Insert page numbers into your document.

addWatermark.name: Add Watermark
addWatermark.subtitle: Stamp text or an image over your PDF pages.

headerFooter.name: Header & Footer
headerFooter.subtitle: Add text to the top and bottom of pages.

invertColors.name: Invert Colors
invertColors.subtitle: Create a "dark mode" version of your PDF.

backgroundColor.name: Background Color
backgroundColor.subtitle: Change the background color of your PDF.

changeTextColor.name: Change Text Color
changeTextColor.subtitle: Change the color of text in your PDF.

addStamps.name: Add Stamps
addStamps.subtitle: Add image stamps to your PDF using the annotation toolbar.
addStamps.usernameHint: This name will appear on stamps you create.

pdfFormFiller.name: PDF Form Filler
pdfFormFiller.subtitle: Fill in forms directly in the browser. Also supports XFA forms.

createPdfForm.name: Create PDF Form
createPdfForm.subtitle: Create fillable PDF forms with drag-and-drop text fields.

removeBlankPages.name: Remove Blank Pages
removeBlankPages.subtitle: Automatically detect and delete blank pages.

imageToPdf.name: Images to PDF
imageToPdf.subtitle: Convert JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, PNM, PGM, PBM, PPM, PAM, JXR, JPX, JP2, PSD, SVG, HEIC, WebP to PDF.

pngToPdf.name: PNG to PDF
pngToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more PNG images.

webpToPdf.name: WebP to PDF
webpToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more WebP images.

svgToPdf.name: SVG to PDF
svgToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more SVG images.

bmpToPdf.name: BMP to PDF
bmpToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more BMP images.

heicToPdf.name: HEIC to PDF
heicToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more HEIC images.

tiffToPdf.name: TIFF to PDF
tiffToPdf.subtitle: Create a PDF from one or more TIFF images.

textToPdf.name: Text to PDF
textToPdf.subtitle: Convert a plain text file into a PDF.

jsonToPdf.name: JSON to PDF
jsonToPdf.subtitle: Convert JSON files to PDF format.

pdfToJpg.name: PDF to JPG
pdfToJpg.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a JPG image.

pdfToPng.name: PDF to PNG
pdfToPng.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a PNG image.

pdfToWebp.name: PDF to WebP
pdfToWebp.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a WebP image.

pdfToBmp.name: PDF to BMP
pdfToBmp.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a BMP image.

pdfToTiff.name: PDF to TIFF
pdfToTiff.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a TIFF image.

pdfToGreyscale.name: PDF to Greyscale
pdfToGreyscale.subtitle: Convert all colors to black and white.

pdfToJson.name: PDF to JSON
pdfToJson.subtitle: Convert PDF files to JSON format.

ocrPdf.name: OCR PDF
ocrPdf.subtitle: Make a PDF searchable and copyable.

alternateMix.name: Alternate & Mix Pages
alternateMix.subtitle: Merge PDFs by alternating pages from each PDF. Preserves Bookmarks.

addAttachments.name: Add Attachments
addAttachments.subtitle: Embed one or more files into your PDF.

extractAttachments.name: Extract Attachments
extractAttachments.subtitle: Extract all embedded files from PDF(s) as a ZIP.

editAttachments.name: Edit Attachments
editAttachments.subtitle: View or remove attachments in your PDF.

addBlankPage.name: Add Blank Page
addBlankPage.subtitle: Insert an empty page anywhere in your PDF.

reversePages.name: Reverse Pages
reversePages.subtitle: Flip the order of all pages in your document.

rotateCustom.name: Rotate by Custom Degrees
rotateCustom.subtitle: Rotate pages by any custom angle.

nUpPdf.name: N-Up PDF
nUpPdf.subtitle: Arrange multiple pages onto a single sheet.

combineToSinglePage.name: Combine to Single Page
combineToSinglePage.subtitle: Stitch all pages into one continuous scroll.

viewMetadata.name: View Metadata
viewMetadata.subtitle: Inspect the hidden properties of your PDF.

editMetadata.name: Edit Metadata
editMetadata.subtitle: Change the author, title, and other properties.

pdfsToZip.name: PDFs to ZIP
pdfsToZip.subtitle: Package multiple PDF files into a ZIP archive.

comparePdfs.name: Compare PDFs
comparePdfs.subtitle: Compare two PDFs side by side.

posterizePdf.name: Posterize PDF
posterizePdf.subtitle: Split a large page into multiple smaller pages.

fixPageSize.name: Fix Page Size
fixPageSize.subtitle: Standardize all pages to a uniform size.

linearizePdf.name: Linearize PDF
linearizePdf.subtitle: Optimize PDF for fast web viewing.

pageDimensions.name: Page Dimensions
pageDimensions.subtitle: Analyze page size, orientation, and units.

removeRestrictions.name: Remove Restrictions
removeRestrictions.subtitle: Remove password protection and security restrictions associated with digitally signed PDF files.

repairPdf.name: Repair PDF
repairPdf.subtitle: Recover data from corrupted or damaged PDF files.

encryptPdf.name: Encrypt PDF
encryptPdf.subtitle: Lock your PDF by adding a password.

sanitizePdf.name: Sanitize PDF
sanitizePdf.subtitle: Remove metadata, annotations, scripts, and more.

decryptPdf.name: Decrypt PDF
decryptPdf.subtitle: Unlock PDF by removing password protection.

flattenPdf.name: Flatten PDF
flattenPdf.subtitle: Make form fields and annotations non-editable.

removeMetadata.name: Remove Metadata
removeMetadata.subtitle: Strip hidden data from your PDF.

changePermissions.name: Change Permissions
changePermissions.subtitle: Set or change user permissions on a PDF.

odtToPdf.name: ODT to PDF
odtToPdf.subtitle: Convert OpenDocument Text files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

csvToPdf.name: CSV to PDF
csvToPdf.subtitle: Convert CSV spreadsheet files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

rtfToPdf.name: RTF to PDF
rtfToPdf.subtitle: Convert Rich Text Format documents to PDF. Supports multiple files.

wordToPdf.name: Word to PDF
wordToPdf.subtitle: Convert Word documents (DOCX, DOC, ODT, RTF) to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

excelToPdf.name: Excel to PDF
excelToPdf.subtitle: Convert Excel spreadsheets (XLSX, XLS, ODS, CSV) to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

powerpointToPdf.name: PowerPoint to PDF
powerpointToPdf.subtitle: Convert PowerPoint presentations (PPTX, PPT, ODP) to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

markdownToPdf.name: Markdown to PDF
markdownToPdf.subtitle: Write or paste Markdown and export it as a beautifully formatted PDF.

pdfBooklet.name: PDF Booklet
pdfBooklet.subtitle: Rearrange pages for double-sided booklet printing. Fold and staple to create a booklet.
pdfBooklet.step2: Pages will be rearranged in booklet order.
pdfBooklet.step3: Print double-sided, flip on short edge, fold and staple.
pdfBooklet.pageCount: Page count will be padded to multiple of 4 if needed.

xpsToPdf.name: XPS to PDF
xpsToPdf.subtitle: Convert XPS/OXPS documents to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

mobiToPdf.name: MOBI to PDF
mobiToPdf.subtitle: Convert MOBI e-books to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

epubToPdf.name: EPUB to PDF
epubToPdf.subtitle: Convert EPUB e-books to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

fb2ToPdf.name: FB2 to PDF
fb2ToPdf.subtitle: Convert FictionBook (FB2) e-books to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

cbzToPdf.name: CBZ to PDF
cbzToPdf.subtitle: Convert comic book archives (CBZ/CBR) to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

wpdToPdf.name: WPD to PDF
wpdToPdf.subtitle: Convert WordPerfect documents (WPD) to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

wpsToPdf.name: WPS to PDF
wpsToPdf.subtitle: Convert WPS Office documents to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

xmlToPdf.name: XML to PDF
xmlToPdf.subtitle: Convert XML documents to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

pagesToPdf.name: Pages to PDF
pagesToPdf.subtitle: Convert Apple Pages documents to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

odgToPdf.name: ODG to PDF
odgToPdf.subtitle: Convert OpenDocument Graphics (ODG) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

odsToPdf.name: ODS to PDF
odsToPdf.subtitle: Convert OpenDocument Spreadsheet (ODS) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

odpToPdf.name: ODP to PDF
odpToPdf.subtitle: Convert OpenDocument Presentation (ODP) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

pubToPdf.name: PUB to PDF
pubToPdf.subtitle: Convert Microsoft Publisher (PUB) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

vsdToPdf.name: VSD to PDF
vsdToPdf.subtitle: Convert Microsoft Visio (VSD, VSDX) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

psdToPdf.name: PSD to PDF
psdToPdf.subtitle: Convert Adobe Photoshop (PSD) files to PDF format. Supports multiple files.

pdfToSvg.name: PDF to SVG
pdfToSvg.subtitle: Convert each page of a PDF file into a scalable vector graphic (SVG) for perfect quality at any size.

extractTables.name: Extract PDF Tables
extractTables.subtitle: Extract tables from PDF files and export as CSV, JSON, or Markdown.

pdfToCsv.name: PDF to CSV
pdfToCsv.subtitle: Extract tables from PDF and convert to CSV format.

pdfToExcel.name: PDF to Excel
pdfToExcel.subtitle: Extract tables from PDF and convert to Excel (XLSX) format.

pdfToText.name: PDF to Text
pdfToText.subtitle: Extract text from PDF files and save as plain text (.txt). Supports multiple files.
pdfToText.note: This tool works ONLY with digitally created PDFs. For scanned documents or image-based PDFs, use our OCR PDF tool instead.

digitalSignPdf.name: Digital Signature PDF
digitalSignPdf.pageTitle: Digital Signature PDF - Add Cryptographic Signature | BentoPDF
digitalSignPdf.subtitle: Add a cryptographic digital signature to your PDF using X.509 certificates. Supports PKCS#12 (.pfx, .p12) and PEM formats. Your private key never leaves your browser.
digitalSignPdf.successMessage: PDF signed successfully! The signature can be verified in any PDF reader.

validateSignaturePdf.name: Validate PDF Signature
validateSignaturePdf.pageTitle: Validate PDF Signature - Verify Digital Signatures | BentoPDF
validateSignaturePdf.subtitle: Verify digital signatures in your PDF files. Check certificate validity, view signer details, and confirm document integrity. All processing happens in your browser.

emailToPdf.name: Email to PDF
emailToPdf.subtitle: Convert email files (EML, MSG) to PDF format. Supports Outlook exports and standard email formats.

fontToOutline.name: Font to Outline
fontToOutline.subtitle: Convert all fonts to vector outlines for consistent rendering across all devices.

deskewPdf.name: Deskew PDF
deskewPdf.subtitle: Automatically straighten tilted scanned pages using OpenCV.
